title: NIT Trichy Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Project Associate and Other Posts
description: National Institute of Technology Tiruchirappalli (NIT Trichy) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Associates, Project Assistants. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Trichy Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and ...
